short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yup Extension to send in-app screenshots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is only for students using Yup online math tutoring.
After you install this extension, you will be able to:
* Start a session with a screenshot instead of a photo from your webcam
* At any time during a session, send your tutor a screenshot from another Chrome tab (e.g. from a PDF or a web page)
